title: Little Artist Board Book Set
description:
Little Artist Board Book Set is comprised of colorfully illustrated portraits of visual and performing artists who have made historical impacts on the world. Illustrations by Lydia Ortiz and words by Emily Kleinman introduce children to these inspiring artists throughout history. The board book includes 4 small books packaged in a slipcase cube and features legendary painters, sculptors, musicians, and performers.

Painters: Georgia O'Keeffe, Salvador Dali, Frida Kahlo, Vincent Van Gogh

Sculptors: Alexander Calder, Maya Lin, Louise Bourgeois, Claes Oldenburg

Musicians: Madonna, Louie Armstrong, Bjork, David Bowie

Performers: Misty Copeland, Charlie Chaplin, Josephine Baker, Lin-Manuel Miranda
